name: PreSpectral
description:
A game demo where you can shoot arrows and stuff (totally not a copy of the spectral arrow thing of 2d block game hehe)

For world-building without building the world, you are trapped in this weird dungeon prison.

Controls:

ControlsControls but like idkWASDMovementzHold down left mouse buttonDraw the arrowRelease left mouse buttonshootJump on arrowsto climb big wallzHold down left mouse button longerfor big shootHold until particlezfor straight shootHold 'S' while releasingto add rope with za arrow (to clear big gaps or to go up) but make sure to collect some rope items first (also doesn't work with straight shot)
